extendedInfo.description: ----------------------------------------------Next UpdatesSaving Scores Online!----------------------------------------------The best Picross(nonogram) puzzle game in Smart Device.-It's FREE!--------------------------------------------Funny Puzzle Game, Logic Square!You can find out hidden image using numbers.SpecsVarious puzzle composition!Adorable logic images!Fun, supporting items!Tutorials for newbies! How to playLeft and top numbers instruct how many blocks should be marked in a row. You must consider leaving at least one empty block between each number. To mark a block, please click the âVâ button. To leave out a bloc, click the âXâ button. Every time you mark a wrong bloc you receive a time penalty. You can learn basics, items, and practice game in tutorialUpcoming updates- New puzzles: so you will never run out of them!- User interface: we will put in our utmost effort to reflect your suggestion. Please review!Your reviews will lead to a better Logicsquare!ContactMail: devsquare.com@gmail.comFacebook: http://www.facebook.com/LogicSquareTwitter: http://twitter.com/devsquarecom----------------------------------------------Logic Square - Picrosshttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.devsquare.logicsquare7Blocks! - Block Puzzlehttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.devsquare.sevenblocks----------------------------------------------

reviews.title: So many ads.
reviews.comment: In response to all the negative feedback about the stalling full page ads after each level, he added them to the beginning of the level too. Dude. Let us pay for a premium no ads version. We\'ll pay.
reviews.author: Juan Baez

reviews.title: Add crazy
reviews.comment: Too many advertisements and the movement is very bulky. Having to make 10 moves to make 1 line was a little too much.
reviews.author: Teigra Kefira

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: More value than any premium app I\'ve ever bought. Keep up the great work :-)
reviews.author: Fred Motson

reviews.title: Very addictive
reviews.comment: Addictive game, i like the story created simply by several pics!
reviews.author: Ada Leung

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: It is a good game. However, be aware that the UI will make you accidentally waste your free powerups if you slip and the fact that the game will bug you to rate five stars.
reviews.author: Hewett Tsoi

reviews.title: Excellent..best exercise for brains
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Kanan Mehta

reviews.title: Lottsa Fun!
reviews.comment: This is a good game to kill some time. Beware time will run away with you. I really like the variety of puzzles that are available.
reviews.author: Winter Corbin

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: Very good game Too many advertises
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Ok so the update fixed the crashing, but now there is a lot of lagging, the game is so slow to respond when I press a direction button. Please fix.
reviews.author: Natasha Holmes

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: I like this type of puzzle game, but the new update has so many ads which disrupts the game experience. A banner is okay but a pop up after every game its so annoying.
reviews.author: Linh Ly

reviews.title: ace
reviews.comment: great game, challenging and so addictive and fun
reviews.author: Kirsty Louise Jones

reviews.title: New ads are in the way
reviews.comment: This game was great, but the new update came with a TON of ads. To the point that they are in front of some of the buttons. It is becoming impossible to play without misclicking into an ad.
reviews.author: Sylvie Boenke-Bowden

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: Love the game but there is not enough time for the larger puzzles, especially since I have big thumb so two-handed doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Michelle Baker

reviews.title: Dumb update.
reviews.comment: New update has too many ads that are slow even on a brand new S4.
reviews.author: Zach Vrchota

reviews.title: I have my fave game back!!
reviews.comment: Thank you for dealing with the add banner! I am so pleased! Back to 5 stars :-D
reviews.author: Mel McDonald

reviews.title: Love!!
reviews.comment: Need more puzzles!! Love the game!!
reviews.author: Nichole Kline

reviews.title: Back at 5*
reviews.comment: Hurrah! Major improvement since bug fix! Thanks for listening to us!!!
reviews.author: Donna Tuck

reviews.comment: Great logic game
reviews.author: Kat McLernon

reviews.title: Motorola
reviews.comment: Brill brill brill play on this all night
reviews.author: Kerry Firth

reviews.title: Love It!!!!
reviews.comment: I love this app!!!
reviews.author: Renee Caldwell
